p: b) Importation of camels from Ethiopia: all camels imported from Ethiopia in 2015 (31,342, 14% of the total) arrived via Djibouti to Adabiya port in North-Eastern Egypt ( Fig 3). Of them, 27,871 remained in Adabiya quarantine ( Fig 3), and 3471 were transferred to Al Qata quarantine in Giza governorate ( Fig 3).
